short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code that links to the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Buddy is a simple yet powerful Google Chrome extension that allows users to instantly generate QR codes for the websites they are currently browsing. With just one click, this user-friendly extension creates a QR code that can be easily downloaded or printed, providing a convenient way to share URLs with others.

Key features:

Instant QR code generation: Generate a QR code for the current webpage with a single click.
Downloadable QR codes: Download the generated QR code as a PNG image for later use or sharing.
Print-ready QR codes: Print the QR code directly from the extension for easy sharing in physical formats.
Sleek and professional design: Enjoy a polished user interface that seamlessly integrates with your browsing experience.
Lightweight and efficient: Designed to consume minimal system resources, ensuring a smooth browsing experience.

Install QR Code Buddy today and enjoy the convenience of generating QR codes for your favorite websites with ease!
